website_summaries.verdict: Some users may want a darker tint for blue light protection, but others will appreciate these as reading glasses.
cons: Lenses and frames are very thin, edges are visible

customer_reviews.title: Worthless as blue light blockers and increase eye strain!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying blue blockers but these don't appear to block out any blue light. I was very unhappy with them and went back and read the product description and it says 30% Blue Blocking. It doesn't appear to even be that much. I don't normally need corrective lenses and I didn't order any correction in the lenses. But the writing on my computer screen is blurry with the glasses on and clear with the glasses off. So the blurriness causes even more eye strain. If you are concerned about all the blue light from your electronics and are hoping for less eye strain, these are not the glasses for you.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: Great style and comfortable...unfortunately the anti-glare coating scratches very easily and the scratches are very noticeable while looking thru the lenses. I would not recommend these if you carry them with you in a pocket due to the ease of scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Don from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these glasses. I stare at a computer screen for 10+ hours a day for a living. I notice my eyes are not straining when I have these on. Also, they look great and are very sturdy! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I ordered +1
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I ordered +1.0 which adds a little correction just enough to make the characters look bigger in the screen and make my eyes less tired. Be aware that this is only for computer. I can't watch tv or anything else with them. My vision gets blurry. I could read with from a distance but don't really need them for that. I love the way they look. Tinted lenses. Comes with a small pouch. My eyes don't get tired as they used to. I'm very happy with my big head.
customer_reviews.author: Waendy

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and they changed their mind. Not a problem, they were Amazon Prime I figured I'd just return them. WRONG. Nowhere on the product page did it say I cannot return these. I only found out when I actually went to return it. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Pros: -cute, I received lots of compliments -noticeable reduction in eye fatigue -comfortable for all day wear -lightweight Cons: -they reflect pretty much everything. If you wear them at work people may be able to see your screen reflect off them. -smudge very easily Overall a solid buy and I'm happy with them. I've been wearing them for about a month now ~40 hours a week and they are still in great shape. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, will get another pair
customer_reviews.text: Got them on time and they are exactly what was advertised. They are lightly tinted but still remove a decent amount of blue light; see my photo where the computer's space-theme desktop looks gray behind the lens. They are lightweight and quite comfortable for me. And my wife even says they look good on me, too. I am going to buy another pair for my work office.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Sensing

customer_reviews.title: This is just  tinted glass. They don't actually block any blue light.
customer_reviews.text: I took these glasses to my optometrist and he examined and told me that they don't actually block any blue light. They are just a piece of brown tinted glass. Do not waste your money. I used them for about 3 months and it took me like a month to get used to computer screen without wearing these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these! No more brightness
customer_reviews.text: Love these! No more brightness! At first it took my eyes a lil adjusting but they do work, my eyes don't feel tired after 8hrs of computer , Netflix watching and I even took them with me to the movies ... I'll be buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great style. More tinted than what the photo shows.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and fit of these glasses! The difference is noticeable on both my phone screen and laptop -- filters out blue light without dulling the screen. Would have given them 5 stars but they are more tinted than what the picture shows, especially when you have them on it kind of looks like you're wearing light tinted sunglasses (you can see in my uploaded pic). It's not a bad look but you can definitely tell you're not wearing normal glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Saccameno

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NO blue ray protection!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a pair of anti blue ray glasses on Amazon and they came with a little anti-blue ray testing card and tiny blue light flashlight. I tested the glasses in the package. Then I tested another pair that I had bought with the same good result. Then I tested it on these glasses with the result of no filtering at all. They are just plain glass.
customer_reviews.author: Leacato

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or time. These glasses have terrible optics, sit unevenly on the face, can't be adjusted, and look like a dollar store - super cheap. I wasn't expecting much for the price. But a $10 pair of readers from your local pharmacy are 4 times better. I bought three strengths and returned the ones I could, but some were not eligible for return and some were. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: daz

customer_reviews.title: Comparison Review:  These were my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of differing computer glasses:  Readers Gaming Glasses: These are larger size lens and seem like something you would use in a movie theater for 3D viewing, the plasticy, bulky feel. But not terrible, suitable for my son's needs doing his homeschool on the computer. 4 stars  Ray 010 slim Vintage These were for me to have the readers while working on my lap top. Only wish they had the spring hinges like the ones below. That would add to the comfort, but otherwise OK-4.5 stars  Spring Hinges Retro Liked these the best due to the style and spring hinges. I would choose these again. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: CPCMommy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I spend my day staring at a screen, so I ordered these to use for work while I wait for a more expensive pair I ordered to arrive. I really wanted to like these and hoped they would work. The blue light blocking was fine, what with the amber lenses.... but the lenses were terrible. They weren't clear at all, and after 1 day of use my eyes really hurt from the strain of using the glasses. Guess you get what you pay for with these. I have returned them and decided to just wait for my high quality ones to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Putney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t actually filter blue light
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are stylish and come with a nice case but they don’t actually serve their purpose. As another reviewer mentioned, the glasses don’t filter blue light when put to the test. The glasses have a yellow tint so they seem like they would do the trick, but I had to slide them on and off multiple times to even notice if there was a difference. I find it more helpful to put my phone on night mode than wear these glasses. They are $8 so you get what you pay for but will be sending these back. Also, the glasses are smaller than they appear in the picture, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: erinerin

customer_reviews.title: I really like them! But they broke :(
customer_reviews.text: These broke literally the day I got them. I really like this style. I also got the plain tortoise style which hasn’t broke. I felt this green color was actually better at blocking light; it was weird lol. I’ll probably re order now that this pair broke. I’m convinced it was a bad egg. I will say these are not comfy with a headset - like pictured- but I also don’t wear glasses normally. I recommend these !!
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell if works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these 2 years ago to wear at my desk job. They have a yellow tint which makes the screen darker, but i am not sure how well the glasses blocks blue light. They do smudge easily, and need to be cleaned a few times a day. Ultimately broke after 1.5 years while I was cleaning the lens--the frame is not very durable. The glasses would have broken much sooner if I don't keep them exclusively on my work desk. Would repurchase if frame was built better and didn't smudge so easily.
customer_reviews.author: purplebagel

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Red Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses for nightime when I am laying in bed reading on my tablet or my phone. They are very nice looking, very light, don't hurt my ears or nose even when I've fallen asleep with them on. My eyes feel rested and they alleviate the discomfort of the glare or brightness of screens. They are pretty nice looking and come with the cutest zippered case. I am getting ready to buy another pair to use in the family room when I am working on my laptop. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I Still Use These Every Day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair a few months ago and it has made a remarkable difference. My eye doctor recommended getting the anti-glare glasses since my eyes would get fatigued after working at a computer screen all day, every day. These Eyekepper glasses are lightweight and have made a huge difference. I can see better at night when I leave work and I no longer have a headache by the end of the day. They are also durable and last for a long time for such a great price! I have already recommended these and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: JoJosModernLife

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of the Benefits
customer_reviews.text: When the glasses first arrived, I thought Eyekepper had sent a pair of magnifiers instead of the amber-tinted model. After a few (admittedly unscientific) tests with color charts, I could see that there actually was some small amount of tint. I'm thankful that it's hardly noticeable but wonder if it has any meaningful benefit and I wasn't able to figure out if there was any anti-glare capability. But the magnification is just right, the glasses are comfortable and I haven't experienced any kind of eyestrain. At best there is some UV protection; worst case you have a great set of light magnifiers. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Not a viable option for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed with these glasses. They would be perfect except I can see the reflection of my screen or window in them so its like there is a constant spot in the middle of the glasses. I have no such issues with my prescription glasses. I have Trifocals made with my computer work in mind. I don't love wearing them for working on the computer which is why I decided to try these. I tried wearing them for a couple of days and they just aren't for me. If it wasn't for seeing the reflection in the lens I could tell my eyes weren't as weary at the end of the day. But reflection was to distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Gina CentralTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses for a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look very nice, fit well and really do make a difference when looking at a computer screen. As some other people mention they smudge a bit easy, but so far that has not been a real issue for me. The come with a nice case and cleaner cloth. Very professional. The best part is that they are magnification glasses and blue light glasses all in one! I did not know which magnification to get so I bought this pair and also a black pair in a lower magnification and both are great.
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Glad to Have Higher Reader Number
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as hard to find Readers above 2.5 strength, for daily computer use. The lightweight is true as described, but unsure if because of I had a issue w sliding down my nose every time I looked down to pick up file or referred to notes. The extension (if can see on picture?) of the one side may contribute to as it’s quite extended from regular use. The Amber Tint is fine during day when widows opened (Florida has two outside descriptions for daylight, rainy & gray? Or blindingly sunny-work from home also). But evening use a little dark but only my opinion perhaps in preference. Just wished held firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Tiny glasses suitable for a child, not adult.
customer_reviews.text: The tiniest glasses imaginable. Each lens is the size of each of my eyes. I am not joking. The description of the glasses as for "narrow head" is double speak for "child's head". I wish I could return them, but I threw away packaging materials bore trying on the glasses. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Saffron Dust

customer_reviews.title: lightweight clear lenses
customer_reviews.text: amazing deal, use for computer/reading. i have 3 pair, last time they had added too many anti-blue light layers and the lenses were too dark, but i took a chance and re-ordered as a really liked the first pair. they came just like the first time, barely tinted how i like. the frames are smart looking and very comfortable and lightweight. i believe the lenses are glass, whatever the material they don't scratch and are crystal clear. i can't tell the difference between these and my $$$ prescription glasses.
customer_reviews.author: furball

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. The lens are not huge like other computer glasses. It looks like regular glasses on me, except for the slight amber tint (which was expected). The only thing "wrong" with it was when it came, the left side was raised higher than the right. I very gently worked the frame, almost molding it and what not, and it's okay now. My guess is the heat from the packaging and shipping caused the plastic frame to bend out of shape. I like that this came with a sturdy zipper case and microfiber cloth. They've helped with the headaches and eye strain I get from working with a computer for hours each day.
customer_reviews.author: annaangela

customer_reviews.title: Reduce eye strains and headaches
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these daily at work for over a year and a half and they are a tremendous help. Reduces eye strain and headaches. In do feel like they slide off my nose a little and have to frequent adjust then, just be aware if you have a narrow bridge. After over a year of daily wear the finish on the arms is began to peel, but for a $5-10 replacement I really can't complain about the life I got out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Small Frames, no reflective protection, useless and unreturnable
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to return - states not returnable. Tested for several days and nights, no difference with or without for both oncoming headlights or chrome reflecting sunlight. I am a software analyst in front of a computer screen all day - tested there and still had eye strain. Frames are too small and sides are in field of vision making them more unsafe. Attempted to return but for some reason, this product does not allow returns. It would be nice if you new that up front. These are useless - don't purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Strebel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: No question these have soothed my usually itchy, tearing, scratchy eyes. I'm staring at some type of screen 12 hours a day. The end of the first day I noticed the level of irritation seemed just short of the usual. (I was well aware I wanted them to work.) By the end of the 2nd day, there was a marked improvement. That has continued, I'm very pleased with the glasses as a whole. The frames are light weight,comfortable and nicely made. The reader prescription was accurate. The glasses arrive in a semi-hard, black zippered case. I have already ordered another pair with no magnification. I would buy them again. Sheesh, I did.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Really works and flattering frame style!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The frame and fit is a really flattering style. I’ve had them for over 4 months and I wear them every night when I get home from work or sometimes wear them when driving home from work at night to help from bright headlights. Has helped relieve my headaches from tv and phone screens. They absolutely work well to protect eyes from blue light at such an affordable price! I recommend these blue light glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: No More Headaches!
customer_reviews.text: A note to anyone considering purchasing these specs: Don't hesitate. Do it! As a night owl, I tend to get the majority of my work accomplished after the kids are in bed. I also have a tendency to squint while I'm on my laptop, which leads to tension headaches. As soon as I received these glasses, I them on, and I'm amazed at the difference it makes while I'm on the computer. I'm certain the squinting -- and headaches -- will stop. A note to my bosses: I will be getting so much work done now that I have these glasses. Feel free to increase my salary.
customer_reviews.author: Danell

customer_reviews.title: Great for long periods at a screen!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I love them because they actually block blue light. The glasses do have a brown tint to them when in sunlight but that’s because of the blue light blocking. I really like them and think they are stylish & cute!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn.blogs

customer_reviews.title: Screws Loose!
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses, style wise and for reading, but the screws holding the ear holders to my ears, fell-out right away, and of course, I could not find them. This necessitated, going out and buying replacements for the hinges, and finding out it was not easy putting those tiny screws back! All ok now, just hope they don't fall-out again!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Varni

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try them as I stare at a large computer screen all day at work. The style is not great, they are a little heavy on the face and ears and hey have that blue tint to the glasses which is off putting. Overall I did notice that they might help a little with eye strain, but wish I would have spent more money on a higher quality glasses as my eyes are important.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair from these folks
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I now recommend against - and this is regardless of vendor - if this is a pair of glasses you wear a lot, long periods of watching, looking, reading, whatever - son't get wire frames or rimless. Once you do something klutzy and bend them, you probably will never get them back into proper alignment. Just find a look you like and go for it.
customer_reviews.author: eideard

customer_reviews.title: They don't actually block blue light
customer_reviews.text: I've had these glasses for years. They're stylish and comfortable, but I recently got another pair from a different brand that came with a blue light test. These failed miserably and hardly blocked any blue light. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lindenberg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to typically write a bad review but I am extremely disappointed. These glasses do not block any blue light out and when I say any I mean NONE AT ALL. The honestly should not be able to market them or mention them as blocking any blue light because there is no truth to it. What’s worse is you cannot return the product, which is not mentioned anywhere on the product description. So they pretty much sell you a product that does not work then they do not allow you to return it, they should not be allowed to sell on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are not of same quality as the ones I ordered last year.
customer_reviews.text: The coating on these new ones is so much dimmer than last year's pair. These new one do not reduce glare like the original pair. I would return them if we were not sheltering in place. I am afraid to take them anywhere to send them back. Would like my money back. They are not of the good quality of last year's pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, but be aware--not eligible for return by seller
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses, they're cute, & I really like the zippered glasses case. I just plop them on over my regular glasses, makes the last hour or so before sleep a little warmer-looking. However, PLEASE BE AWARE, as of October 2017, when I was returning a different item from my order, I noticed that these were marked as NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN if you buy from "EYEKEPPER-US" as I did. I'm not sure if they make exceptions if you've got a compelling reason to return, but you'll have to work harder for a return if they do allow it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan of Arc

customer_reviews.title: No difference seen,
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these when I tried them on, the fit & style is great HOWEVER I could not tell any difference when looking at my monitor from my normal reading glasses AND even though I ordered the exact strength I use now with my normal reading glasses I couldn't see as well reading with them either.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these! Then they broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just less than a year ago and today they broke. They were my favorite reading glasses because they didn't slide off, and the lens never got scratched. The anti-glare coating kind of started to come off, and one of the screws on the hinge needed to be tightened and then the hinge itself just broke for no reason. I am considering buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: A little longer on delivery that usual because of shipment but worth the wait. Stylish, and amber tint is not severe enough to be blatantly noticed but enough to diffuse the glare and "white" light from my laptop at work.
customer_reviews.author: RKI I.

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from this company twice. The first time I love the glasses so much that I bought 2 more pairs after. However, the second time I ordered the tortoise glasses came with the blue reflective coating on both sides of the lens! Its impossible to see through them and it literally reflects all of the blue light back into your eyes. I was happy with the black. The film scratches quite easily and the first pair of glasses I bought 6 mo ago now has a sizable scratch across the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Skies

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! They are stylish and comfortable to wear. They definitely help with eye strain. I have this particular problem where if I read any book or document off of an e-reader (iPad, iPhone, etc.) for long periods of time, I would have these red burst blood vessels in the inner corner of my eyes, and it would take a few days for them to go away once I had done the damage. With these glasses, there is almost no red in my eyes at all! Very happy with my purchase. The lenses are definitely tinted, like a light amber color, which you can sort of see in the pictures, but it's not too noticeable​.
customer_reviews.author: pixiedust

customer_reviews.title: Defective workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair. The first one lost its screw quickly. Manufacturer would not send another. I later found out why. The screw holes could not be lined up, so the screw never really secured the arm. I spent my time filing down the joint to get them lined up using the screw from the second pair after that pair broke. The main part of the second one broke off at the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping me with quality sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have 'Light Issues" at night, light really bothers me and keeps me from sleeping. I wear them at night when reading on my computer and watching TV, and all I know ids, i have been sleeping much better. I have changed nothing else, so I know it's the filtering of the light that does it. Just bought more to carry in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eve S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive optics, a real step up from bargain readers
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the optics on these. Previously, I've only used really inexpensive 2-pair for $9 sorts of readers and they've generally been fine, but these are a real step up in clarity. The anti glare coating makes a noticeable difference with shiny laptop and tablet screens. The lenses are also larger than typical readers and sharp edge to edge, meaning I can enjoy an entire magazine page or 15" laptop screen without having to move my head to a narrow focus sweet spot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Neat design, major eye strain saver
customer_reviews.text: If you're staring at screens all day, definitely definitely get something like this, major eye strain/headache/etc. reducer. Also this design is really neat, people compliment them every time I wear them. I don't tell them they cost like $12 or whatever on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I LOVED them. Unlike other reviews, I didn't really notice a smell. But, after being careful to ONLY use the cloth that came with the glasses, the lenses became so clouded over in spots that I actually couldn't see! Ridiculous. But Amazon has been great about accepting my return. I was so disappointed in this particular pair. I have another pair of Eyekeppers for use with my laptop (need different strength, because the screen is farther away); the yellow tinted ones and I like them. I no longer get headaches from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: They really do work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while I studied, for hours on the computer, for a national board exam. I even used them for the exam because it was an 8 hour long, computerized exam. They helped tremendously. I didn't get those headaches after staring at a screen for hours. Afterwards I lent them to a friend who would get pounding headaches after staring at the computer all day at work. She was so thankful I gave them to her. She said they worked and her headaches stopped. I bought them thinking they were cheap and if they didn't work, then all I lost was $10, but these glasses actually do work.
customer_reviews.author: JenJo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, heavily tinted, gives you a HEADACHE
customer_reviews.text: AVOID!! bought these to use while on the computer. First, the tint it VERY heavy so you will look slightly dorky with them on. Second, the frame is VERY thin and flimsy, one wrong move and I'm sure they'll snap. Third, after about 3 minutes of using them my eyes feel like I opened them underwater in a heavily bleached pool. They definetely DO NOT serve their purpose. My eyes are better off without them while on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Newell

customer_reviews.title: Really Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These reading - computer glasses are really great. I liked them so much and also my husband liked them and had never worn reading glasses before. He wanted some also, so I bought a pair for him. They do wonders to soothing away the brightness of the computer screen and also by allowing the user to have the application of enhanced enlargement (ours was 150), just makes everything so much more pleasant and easy. It really helps with eye strain. We both love them. I have only put 4 stars and I know nothing about their longevity and will review after having them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Morri

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Yellow tinted lenses make everything look dirty and the side piece fell off after 2 wearings
customer_reviews.author: HightowerAES

customer_reviews.title: Corrective lens make theses perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different pair of blue light glasses which I like, but the computer screen was blurry as I wear reading glasses. I am so happy with these corrective lens blue light glasses They are perfect and they came the next day. Totally satisfied and would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't decrease eyestrain; gave me a headache
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I spend most of the day working on a computer, and I was told that these would help with eyestrain, but the three times I've tried to use them, I've developed a headache within 15-20 minutes of putting them on, and my eyes seem even more tired than usual. The glasses almost seem to make my vision cloudier, even though I cleaned the lenses with the accompanying cleaning cloth multiple times, so I wonder if the lenses are just really poorly made. I was hoping to return them and get a refund since these are literally doing the opposite of what I purchased them to do, but apparently that isn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan Pillai

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, I've bought 2 pairs, need another. Why? Because the arms break easily...and no, I do not take off by the arm, I have been wearing glasses for a long time and never had the arms break so easily, in fact just once before and my fault, I sat on the glasses. So I'm not sure what happens with these, but if you get a pair that don't break you'll love them, the clarity is excellent and really does help with eye fatigue when using your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great fit, a slightly yellowish tint to the lense but super clear compared to my cheapie Primark readers.
customer_reviews.author: Mona M.

customer_reviews.title: A Big Help For Eye Strain
customer_reviews.text: I work at a computer all day, and although I do not have a prescription for glasses, I've noticed lately that my eyes get very dry and I squint terribly at the screen by the end of the day. I did a bit of research and came across mention of computer glasses. This pair already has many positive reviews, so I thought I'd give them a try. And I'm pleased to add another positive review! I noticed a huge improvement after one day of wearing these at work! I definitely recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING RELIEF FOR MY EYES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a pair for $99 from another brand online. I'm SO glad I checked Amazon! This price is INCREDIBLY FANTASTIC! I had these delivered at work. I took off my readers, and put these on right away. WHAT A DIFFERENCE!!! It makes me realize the little wrinkle between my eyes is being caused by using readers to look at the computer screen!!! I will DEFINITELY be purchasing more of these. This is one of my all time favorite products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caera

customer_reviews.title: blue light protection
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are amazing, I get so many compliments and in my opinion, I think they help with eye fatigue. My vision gets a bit blurry when I work on a computer for a long time. My ophthalmologist recommended getting reading glasses. My friend got a similar pair and she seems happy with it. Start a trend ladies and gents! ;D
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are sturdy and the optical clarity is wonderful, I've never had readers so good. The selection of powers is extensive, I highly recommend these. This frame style is not that glamorous but it is sturdy, and since we reading glass wearers seem to be always taking them off and hooking them on our shirt, or storing in purses or pockets, dropping on the floor, etc. sturdiness is important.
customer_reviews.author: hereandnow

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I do really like these. The feel a tad flimsy.... like the bows need tightening. I really feel like the ad photo made the lenses look rounder.... instead the shape is just kindof boring. Overall a good value though. Shipped quickly & with a nice zipper case.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I have had eye strain for the last year and have done everything possible to try to reduce this by moving my computer monitors distance around, the level I sit at when I look at the screen... the 20-20-20 technique.... I tried everything. I still felt like my eyes were insanely sore at the end of everyday. So I invested in these (for 11$... haha cheapest investment ever) and they have changed my entire workday. No more eye strain or soreness at the end of the day! Definitely spend the 10$ haha it's worth it, I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Heather202

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying a second and third pair
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for blue light readers, these are perfect. The price is awesome. The fit is awesome and for computer, tablet, book, and phone reading in the dark they do the job of the much more$$$ type. If you want a pair for TV viewing, order 0 magnification.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy R Rivello

customer_reviews.title: Really made a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I use a computer all day, every day at work and eye strain had gotten to be such a problem that I had daily headaches and my vision would be horrible by mid-afternoon every day. I've been using these glasses every day for a couple months and I've seen a huge difference! No more 'fried eyes' by 3 pm! Eye strain headaches are gone. I rated 4 stars instead of 5 because #1: the glasses do have a tendency to slip down my nose. #2: The frame style is not the most flattering, I wish there were more choices. But I will still wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Carter

customer_reviews.title: Price Makes Them Worth It
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are pretty great. I wear them in the mornings at work and i do notice a difference. The screen is much more gentle on my eyes. I really can't imagine working without them now. There is a slight yellow tint, but i don't wear them all the time, just when i'm going to be staring at my computer for long periods. Also, they are smaller in person than in the pictures, so i might not recommend them if you think you have a large head. Like i said, the price is what sold me. I bought other glasses that were more expensive and they did not cut it at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. A.

customer_reviews.title: These are really cheap... and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I know they're only ten bucks but the plastic is so flimsy and the lenses are a cheap plastic as well and smudge all up constantly. Frustrating to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Anti-blue light glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've had these glasses only a week but so far, so good. They arrived right on time. They are light weight, "stylish" and very comfortable. Mine have clear glass, and they are so comfortable that I forget I'm wearing them and find myself wearing them throughout the day even when not looking at my laptop screen. I've been diagnosed with early stage macular degeneration so I'll try anything that might prevent it from progressing. Two weeks later, I ordered a pair for my daughter who finds them wonderful...thanks!
customer_reviews.author: diana howe baker

customer_reviews.title: Glasses got scratched really fast, and they don't honor or answer
customer_reviews.text: Update: I did not receive any feedback or they have not contacted me either, not a good outlook I use regular cleaner and soft cloth and still got scratched Made of poor plastic. I would not recommend and this less than 60 days and not even continued use. Less than ,6 months, definitely not worth the look and plastic lenses
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These make my vision warp and feel like 3D glasses. Eyesight is worse and does not prevent the computer glare. Even though its Prime, you cannot return or exchange them. Just lost money and cant use these at all. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalini

customer_reviews.title: Get a better nights sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my older kindle fire doesn't have a night mode. I love to read using my Fire before retiring but as we all know the blue light from screens keeps you from falling asleep fast. Using these glassed I can read when I want and still fall asleep quickly (this is verified by my Sleep Number bed's Android app). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kriebel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for while on my computer. Light - stylish - comfortable. And reduce eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Corgi

customer_reviews.title: I felt my eyes relax!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help my eyes relax from electronic screen use before sleep, but I find myself using them all day. I definitely feel less eye strain blocking out the blue light. These are comfortable, very light and easy to wear for long periods of time. They also make me look very studious, LOL. I would recommend these to anyone looking to cut the glare from electronic screens. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Laaran

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these and love them. Get lots of compliments at work, and they’re really a great value and work well
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the difference the 2nd day! I have two monitors i use all day for work and i immediately noticed the difference. It eliminated the blue light and i don't get headaches from looking at computer screens all day. On the plus side, they are very stylish! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! No return policy!
customer_reviews.text: These are impossible to clean! I've tried everything, every cloth, solution, which usually work wonders for my other glasses. Nothing can clean the smudges which seem to appear out of nowhere since I don't touch them. Throw away the glasses, keep the case.
customer_reviews.author: NazNaz

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I use the computer and my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that these glasses even existed until I had to replace my broken readers. I'm using this pair now as I type. I love them! I use the computer and my phone all the time and these glasses do provide a better level of eye protection from all of my technology. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina LaRea

customer_reviews.title: Great for Accounting & Spreadsheets
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these glasses which is why I only chose to spend $12 on them. I've had them for more than several months now and they work very well. They have not worn down or scratched. I stare at Excel sheets all day long and these keep my eyes from getting fatigued and they are comfortable to wear all day. The zipper on the case, on the other hand, broke the first day I had them but i just keep it in my desk drawer at work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Eyekepper glasses for an elderly person who has been struggling with vision problems which make viewing her PC monitor "challenging". I did not not know if using the Eyekepper glasses would improve her situation. She has informed me that wearing the Eyekepper glasses has made a very noticeable improvement regarding viewing her PC monitor. She and I are extremely pleased regarding the performance of the Eyekepper glasses.
customer_reviews.author: DGL

customer_reviews.title: Cause Headache, Eye Strain
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible and not eligible for return! There is a terrible glare which forces you to strain your eyes to see the screen, cause headache after just a few minutes. I don't even know if they are effective in blocking blue light, but they cause so much pain there is no way they can be useful. AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: drachbro

customer_reviews.title: smaller than picture makes it seem.
customer_reviews.text: the picture makes them look bigger. they are small and i dont like how they fit. not enough to return them but they arent something id buy again. they work a little but ive used ones that are better for a similar price. i like that they come in a case with a eye glass cleaner cloth
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: I really love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really love these glasses. They are very stylish and hip, but the truth is that they absolutely prevent the computer work fatigue that I was experiencing before. I would recommend this product to everybody who has eye fatigue and dry eyes. For some reason, also my eyes seem to be less dry since I have been using the Eyekeppers computer glasses. They are also great for regular document and book reading, cookings, etc. I ordered two additional pairs for the return to school.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stoops

customer_reviews.title: 1.25 great, 1.50 ? Lens is foggy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 1.25, but when I got 2 pairs of 1.50, they are filmy and it looks like there is some smudges inside the lens, I hope its just a weird thing with these 2 pairs, the first pair is great, but wanted one for my and my husband a little stronger. =\ waiting for a response from eyekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. It makes everything super bright and yellow
customer_reviews.text: Not that great. It makes everything super bright and yellow, which isn't bad, but also hurts and strains my eyes because it seems like it almost prescription lenses, as if you aren't looking through just regular non prescription lenses. I'm not a fan and haven't used them more than once bc my eyes can't take it. May work for others but not for me
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job and I work on a computer all day, 6 days a week. My eyes were very tired and could barely focus at night. This work amazing! My eyes aren’t tired anymore and I get compliments on them. A lot of people in my office started buying them because I told them they work.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I get terrible migraines, and sometimes at the end of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to get used to wearing them while at work, but I've already noticed a difference. I get terrible migraines, and sometimes at the end of the work day my eyes are twitching from starting at screens for so long. I don't have so much eye fatigue anymore with these glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 pairs!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a cute pair of clear computer glasses for a while, and others that I’ve tried were just way to small for my face shape. These are great!! Just as advertised, great size and blue blocking for sure. I ended up purchasing the black and multicolor ones as well! Love love love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael moss

customer_reviews.title: Love them! No more dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love them. This is the 2nd pair that i ordered. Jus in case i really love them (which i do) i can have a pair at work and at home! No more dry eyes( 9 ours in front of 3 computer screens) and very stylish! Definitely needed these a long time ago! The case is very cute and practical which also includes a cleaning cloth......so much for the money spent! These work great and i am encouraging co-workers to purchase these as well. Absolute great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these to anyone who uses a screen for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This work really well for me! I am on a computer for 8+ hours a day with work and they really help my eyes and my head. I would highly recommend these to anyone who uses a screen for a large majority of their day. It's way less expensive than medication to help your headache/migraine. I was worried that they wouldn't fit because I have a really wide face but they actually fit really well and are comfortable. The only complaint I have is that they get dirty really easily and are hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for continuous computer use (especially at night)
customer_reviews.text: Just got these glasses and have been using them this entire week to study and I already feel a difference! As a student, I am always looking at a computer or phone screen for a majority of the day. I recently started noticing after long study hours that my eyes would feel very tired/strained/ fatigued, and I would get minor headaches. So far, using these glasses has made studying at a computer screen more pleasant. I also started noticing that i am able to fall asleep more easily compared to before. This has only been used for about a week, but I am impressed with the result so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Little bid small
customer_reviews.text: I brought it 2 years ago it wasn't that bad. But it was little bit small for me. In my opinion, the glasses should be little bit loose on the face but glasses arm must be tight. So if you have small face it maybe looks good on you.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: This is rediculous. How do I contact the seller?
customer_reviews.text: How on Earth do I return these? My Amazon app says it's not returnable, but I can't figure out why. They don't work and have horrible glare/cause more eye strain, which is the opposite of what I was expecting. I can't find a way to send them back and my package has no return address, so I don't even know where they came from. This is infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these in my usual reading glasses magnification. Unlike the several other pairs I have, I have to squint to read my screen. I don't know if that is a result of the UV tinting (which, as others have mentioned, considerably stronger than the pictures suggest) or that the magnification is off somehow, but things are very blurry through them. Others seem to like these. Not me.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Readers and anti glare!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses with magnification and anti glare! Stylish and lightweight! I have a very small nose bridge, so they slip down. I use eye pads to keep that from happening. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: The D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a very attractive price point. They're well built, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, daughter liked it so much bought two more, so she and wife can have a pair at work and home. This brand is slightly higher quality than the two pack (which is also fine for the money). If you're willing to spend a couple bucks more get this one, if getting two pairs for the lowest possible price is vital, then get this one:
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Cute, chic, and performable
customer_reviews.text: Nice light glasses that I use at work to block some of the blue-light since I am staring at a computer all day. Recommend purchasing but then also swithcing between using LUX program on computer and glasses. Wearing them all the time can mess up your circadian rhythm especially when you step outside.
customer_reviews.author: YoginiR

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can not describe how much I LOVE these! Great style, I get tons of compliments. Work GREAT! I could tell a reduction in eye fatigue & blurriness immediately. I keep them in a case in my backpack & go between 4 offices. So you can treat them tough & they hang in there. I would buy again in a heartbeat! Absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lovvorn

customer_reviews.title: The price matches the quality
customer_reviews.text: The effect of soothing the eyes works VERY well. I work in front of 3 computers screens most of my waking hours (I know...) I notice that after a couple of weeks of wearing these that I might need an eye exam because I was having trouble reading with them; NOPE! The lens coating was wearing off and distorting the acuity. Too bad about the quality. I worked out the math. If I order 24 pairs a years (2 per month) then I'll spend a little over $200 on these glasses which matches what I would pay for a prescription pair that themselves last a year or so. This way I can always have new lenses!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are my #3 choice behind #2 CGID CT46 Premium TR90 Frame Blue Light Blocking Glasses, and #1 choice Gunnar Onyx Intercept. Even so, I still like the light frames, and the soothing blue light blocking. These are very similar to CGID glasses, but at a cheaper price. The CGID frames are a little more comfortable, and seem to be more indestructible. These glasses are worth the price, considering they come with a case and cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the tortoise colored glasses
customer_reviews.text: I a wearing the EV as I am reviewing your product. Since, the first day I received the glasses I have worn them consistently: working on my computer, during my shopping journeys, crossword puzzles, etc. The yellow tint is a comfort for my eyes and my eyes don't seem to be as tired. I love the tortoise colored glasses. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Hobble

product_meta.title: Eyekepper Blue Light Filter Glasses for Women Men Reading Computer Screen Blocking UV Rays Anti Glare Reader Eyeglasses
feature_bullets: Standard Frame : The -able frame material is plastic. With Spring hinge and aspheric lenses, it fits medium to wider head size. The color of the BB40 lenses is lighter than the previous yellow lenses, result in avoiding color distortion to a greater extent, with 40% blue light blocking for wavelength 395nm-500nm. The lenses do not block blue color of online test for color filtering properties

Anti Blue Ray Glasses : Our anti blue ray glasses can obstruct injurious blue ray, as per test via the spectrometer (the performance of blue light blocking) it blocks 29% within 500nm, 32% within 490nm, 33% within 480nm, 35% within 470nm, 36% within 460nm, 37% within 450nm, 39% within 440nm, 51% within 430nm, 93% within 420nm and more than 99% within 400nm-410nm

Comfortable Eyewear : The frame is comfortable to wear and the lenses light transmittance is very good. Besides, casual frame design keeps you looks professional and fashionable while working or reading. Suitable for different face types. Perfect gift for your friends, parents, grandparents and relatives. Provides 100% UV protection. Almost no color distortion

Product Dimensions : Lens width about 1 7/8 inches (48mm), Frame width about 5 1/8 inches (130mm), Lens height about 1 7/16 inches (37mm), Frame height about 1 5/8 inches (41mm), Bridge (DBL) about 5/8 inch (16mm), Temple length about 5 5/16 inches (135mm)
Computer Gaming Glasses : Superior blue light blocking computer glasses
